vehicles.name: 2024 Mercedes-Benz S-Class
vehicles.description: Experience ultimate luxury with the latest Mercedes-Benz S-Class featuring cutting-edge technology and unparalleled comfort. This flagship sedan represents the pinnacle of automotive engineering with its sophisticated design, advanced safety features, and premium materials throughout.
keyFeatures: Executive rear seating package with massage

vehicles.name: 2024 BMW X5 M50i
vehicles.description: The ultimate luxury SUV combining performance, comfort, and cutting-edge technology for the modern driver. The BMW X5 M50i delivers exceptional driving dynamics with its powerful engine and advanced chassis systems.

vehicles.name: 2024 Tesla Model S Plaid
vehicles.description: The fastest production sedan ever built with tri-motor all-wheel drive and revolutionary technology. The Model S Plaid represents the pinnacle of electric vehicle performance and innovation.
